Title: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command ('OS Command Injection')
Description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command ('OS Command Injection') in Microsoft.Data.SqlClient.
AffectedVersions: All versions up to 1.1.3, all versions starting from 2.0.0 before 2.1.2
NotImpacted: All versions after 1.1.3 before 2.0.0, all versions starting from 2.1.2
